name: Barrier Master
effects: Increase resistance to all elements by 15%

name: Barrier Master
魔壁操縱者
마법 장벽의 마스터
Maître de la barrière
Barrieremeister
Maestro de la barrera
desc_short: Boost DEF and SPR by 15%, and fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance by 15%
提高15%防禦精神、全屬性耐性的數值
방어력과 정신력 15%, 불, 얼음, 번개, 물, 바람, 땅, 빛, 어둠속성 저항력 15% 상승
Augmente la DEF et la PSY de 15%, et la rés. À feu/glace/foudre/eau/vent/terre/lumière/ténèbres de 15%
Erhöht ABW und PSY um 15% und Res. gegen Feuer, Eis, Blitz, Wasser, Wind, Licht und Dunkel um 15%.
Aumenta DEF, ESP y la res. al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz y oscuridad un 15%
desc_long: Boosts DEF and SPR by 15%, and fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance by 15%.
提高15%防禦精神、全屬性耐性的數值。
방어력과 정신력이 15%, 불, 얼음, 번개, 물, 바람, 땅, 빛, 어둠속성 저항력이 15% 상승합니다.
Augmente la DEF et la PSY de 15%, et la résistance à feu / glace / foudre / eau / vent / terre / lumière / ténèbres de 15%.
Erhöht ABW und PSY um 15% und Res. gegen Feuer, Eis, Blitz, Wasser, Wind, Licht und Dunkel um 15%.
Aumenta la DEF, el ESP y la resistencia al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz y oscuridad un 15%.
